name: Mango Cilantro Slaw
author: Randy Warner
summary: This is different twist on cabbage slaw. It's very easy and the mango and honey make it sweet; no sugar in this recipe! Great by itself or wrap a corn tortilla around grilled tilapia and top with this cilantro slaw for a great-tasting fish taco! For a bit thicker dressing you can add additional mayonnaise.
ingredients: 1  firm, ripe mango - peeled, seeded, and cut into 1/2-inch pieces
directions: Whisk vinegar, oil, honey, mayonnaise, celery seed, poppy seeds, salt, and black pepper together in a bowl until smooth and creamy
Add cabbage, mango, cilantro, and green onions; toss until well-combined
Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate until flavors blend, about 1 hour
